SELECT A.RSST_DOC_ID AS 'prdtId' /*산출물ID*/ , A.AFFR_CL_ID AS 'affrClId' /*업무분류ID*/ , B.AFFR_CL_NM AS 'affrClNm' /*업무분류이름*/ , A.AFFR_CL_GROUP AS 'affrClGroup' /*게시판분류이름*/ , A.TITL_NM AS 'titlNm' /*제목*/ , A.SBC_NM AS 'sbcNm' /*내용*/ , A.RTRV_CNT AS 'rtrvCnt' /*조회수*/ , A.KEYWORD_NM AS 'keywordNm' /*키워드*/ , A.ATTC_FILE_ID AS 'attcFilId' /*첨부파일*/ , A.RGST_ID AS 'rgstId' /*등록자ID*/ , dbo.fn_getUserName(RGST_ID) AS 'rgstNm' /*등록자*/ , A.RGST_OPS_ID AS 'rgstOpsId' /*등록자부서ID*/ , A.DEL_YN AS 'delYn' /*삭제여부*/ , convert(varchar(10), A.FRST_RGST_DT, 120) AS 'frstRgstDt' /*등록일*/ FROM IRIS_KNLD_RSST_DOC A JOIN IRIS_KNLD_AFFR_CL B ON B.AFFR_CL_ID = A.AFFR_CL_ID WHERE A.DEL_YN = 'N' AND A.AFFR_CL_GROUP = '${affrClId}'
AND TITL_NM like '%${titlNm}%'
AND dbo.fn_getUserName(RGST_ID) like '%${rgstNm}%'
ORDER BY A.RSST_DOC_ID DESC

WITH AFFR_MST AS ( SELECT KAC.AFFR_CL_ID ,KAC.AFFR_CL_L ,convert(varchar(255), AFFR_CL_NM) as master_path FROM IRIS_KNLD_AFFR_CL KAC WHERE KAC.DEL_YN = 'N' AND KAC.SUPI_AFFR_CL_ID = '0' UNION ALL SELECT KAC2.AFFR_CL_ID ,KAC2.AFFR_CL_L ,CAST(KAC3.master_path + '>' + KAC2.AFFR_CL_NM AS VARCHAR(255)) master_path FROM IRIS_KNLD_AFFR_CL KAC2 ,AFFR_MST KAC3 WHERE KAC2.SUPI_AFFR_CL_ID = KAC3.AFFR_CL_ID ) SELECT KRD.RSST_DOC_ID AS 'prdtId' /*산출물ID*/ , KRD.AFFR_CL_ID AS 'affrClId' /*업무분류ID*/ , AM.master_path AS 'affrClNm' /*업무분류이름*/ , KRD.AFFR_CL_GROUP AS 'affrClGroup' /*게시판분류이름*/ , KRD.TITL_NM AS 'titlNm' /*제목*/ , KRD.SBC_NM AS 'sbcNm' /*내용*/ , KRD.RTRV_CNT AS 'rtrvCnt' /*조회수*/ , KRD.KEYWORD_NM AS 'keywordNm' /*키워드*/ , KRD.ATTC_FILE_ID AS 'attcFilId' /*첨부파일*/ , KRD.RGST_ID AS 'rgstId' /*등록자ID*/ , dbo.fn_getUserName(RGST_ID) AS 'rgstNm' /*등록자*/ , KRD.RGST_OPS_ID AS 'rgstOpsId' /*등록자부서ID*/ , KRD.DEL_YN AS 'delYn' /*삭제여부*/ , convert(varchar(10), KRD.FRST_RGST_DT, 120) AS 'frstRgstDt' /*등록일*/ FROM AFFR_MST AM ,IRIS_KNLD_RSST_DOC KRD WHERE KRD.DEL_YN = 'N' --AND AM.AFFR_CL_L = 3 AND AM.AFFR_CL_ID = KRD.AFFR_CL_ID AND RSST_DOC_ID = #{prdtId}

SELECT AFFR_CL_ID as affrClId ,AFFR_CL_NM as affrClNm ,AFFR_NM as affrNm ,SUPI_AFFR_CL_ID as supiAffrClId ,AFFR_CL_L as affrClL ,AFFR_CL_GROUP as affrClGroup ,RTRV_SEQ as rtrvSeq ,DEL_YN as delYn FROM IRIS_KNLD_AFFR_CL WHERE DEL_YN = 'N' AND AFFR_CL_GROUP = #{affrClGroup}
